org.javautil.document.style
Interface StyleParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultStyleParser
public interface StyleParser

Parses a StyleDefinition into a Style. More specifically, this class takes a StyleDefinition object, a string representation of a Style that is more human readable, and translates it into a Style object, a java object that is third-party api friendly. Generally a style must be transformed into another object before it can be rendered in a document.

Author:
bcm

Method Summary
 Style parse(StyleDefinition definition)
          Performs the parsing of a style from a definition
